entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
